Body: So I am on a mac and I need USB forwarded into docker image. Thus I spin up docker-machine on virtualbox with usb forwarding. The only thing is that it does not see my docker images from Docker for Mac and I really would like to share them. How to do such thing?
Best choice: `docker push`.  Working choice: `docker save`.
can we somehow map files\folders for docker in the boot2docker VM to see docker files in the mac OS?
No, theyâ€™re separate virtual machines and using different virtualization technologies.  Good third choice: re-run `docker build` for each of your local images in the third environment.
